participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and introspective, Emily enjoys hands-on activities and values her relationships.
participant_1.background: My most difficult decision was to leave my family behind when I moved away to college. I don’t like to eat meat. I work on a project at my day job, then go home and build something with my hands. I own a dog who is my best friend. I play the drums.

participant_2.name: Jacob
participant_2.personality: Ambitious and compassionate, Jacob is passionate about justice and enjoys spending time with his loved ones.
participant_2.background: I live in a city where the tall people are few and far between. I've had to rescue people who were caught in riptides. I am also a full-time student studying radiology at a local college. I’m pursuing my law degree. I am a high school student.

content.text: What are you doing after high school?
I'm pursuing a law degree.
Wow, that's great! What made you want to go into law?
I've always been interested in justice and helping people.
That's awesome! I'm sure you'll be a great lawyer.
Thank you! I hope so.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to play the piano and spend time with my friends and family.
That sounds great! I like to play the drums and spend time with my dog.
Dogs are the best!
They are! What kind of dog do you have?
I have a golden retriever named Buddy.
Aw, golden retrievers are the best! I used to have one named Buddy too.
That's awesome! I'm sure he was a great dog.
He was the best dog I ever had.
I'm sure you miss him a lot.
I do. But I'm glad I have the memories.
Memories are the best way to keep the people we love close to us.
They are. Thank you for talking with me today. It was nice to meet you.
You too! I'm glad we got to chat.
